mapper.insert: insert into ec_cust_collaborator (cust_no, collaborator, collaborate_date, create_user, create_date, create_time, update_user, update_date, update_time, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collaborator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collaborateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ec_cust_collaborator set collaborate_date = #{collaborateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and collaborator = #{collaborator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cust_no, collaborator, collaborate_date, create_user, create_date, create_time, update_user, update_date, update_time, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_cust_collaborator where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
